response.original_title: Shaun the Sheep: A Prickly Problem
response.overview: It's all happening down at Mossy Bottom Farm. Shaun, Bitzer, Farmer and the rest of the gang are back for another eight episodes and they're joined by a multitude of visitors including rude rock'n'roll stars, escaped convicts and hedgehogs in need of a good night's sleep. In these episodes we're treated to the Pigs displaying their more sophisticated side, a very hostile game of cricket and Shaun discovering the importance of a good hairstyle.
response.title: Shaun the Sheep: A Prickly Problem
